description:
RICH Token or (RICH) is more than just cryptocurrency. It was found to solve a problem.

Continuing the path traced by electricity, oil, computer and the inter, et, financial technology, often shortened to "Fintech" and the blockchain are commonly called the "fourth industrial revolution". Cryptocurrencies are a part of this revolution, and they have experienced significant market growth over the recent years, including not only Bitcoin, but numberless altcoins continuing to be created, developed, and expanded since 2015. In this landscape, RICH Token (RICH), a cutting-edge cryptocurrency utilizing smart contract technology was born. We want to create a world where, for example, if we consider 20,000 dollars of investment, it is possible to see that 8,000 dollars were used for micro-hydroelectric power in the AsiaPacific, while the other 12,000 dollars would be used to help to build solar panels in Mexico. This is the world we're dreaming of at the richtoken.co.in . By creating a world in which RICH Token (RICH) investment can, thanks to the blockchain, be carried transparently and securely, the RICH Platform is promoting the RICH Token (RICH) investment.
name: RICH Token
